programme.title: Force
programme.desc: A sharp and intelligent cop ACP Yashvardhan takes down a drug ring including drug lord Reddy Anna. Now, Reddy's brother wants him dead.

programme.title: Apaharan
programme.desc: A tumultuous and complex relationship between a father and son, set against the backdrop of a thriving kidnapping industry in the Hindi heartland of Biha.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: Celebrity siblings Sonam, Rhea and Harshavardhan Kapoor spill some secrets about each other over a cup of coffee with host Karan Johar.

programme.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
programme.desc: A man struggles to win over members of his girlfriend's family, who all want her to marry someone else.

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: Aisha is a girl with a simple diktat: everyone's business is her business. Arjun, a boy with even a simpler set of beliefs thinks Aisha should mind her own business.

programme.title: Dil Jo Bhi Kahey
programme.desc: Filmed in Sweden and Mauritius, this film follows the love of an Indian boy and a European girl, in the face of opposition from both families.

programme.title: War Chhod Na Yaar
programme.desc: Rajveer and Quereshi are battalion captains of India and Pakistan. However, on the actual battlefield, they and their troops develop an unlikely friendship which is further put to the test.

programme.title: Singham Returns
programme.desc: A brave and honest policeman settles every dispute in his town with words of wisdom, and only resorts to force when necessary.

programme.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
programme.desc: A charitable, happy-go-lucky man embarks on a mission to meet a generous princess who helps people, so he takes the place of a prince.

programme.title: Darbar
programme.desc: A police officer goes on a chase to hunt down a long-dreaded gangster for fulfilling his own secret agenda.

programme.title: Akira
programme.desc: A college student single-handedly takes on four corrupt police officers in a bid to prove her innocence.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati and SS Rajamouli of 'Bahulbali' fame join host Karan Johar for an evening full of interesting revelations and fun activities over coffee.

programme.title: Pyar To Hona Hi Tha
programme.desc: A jilted woman flying to India to win her ex back gets in trouble as a co-traveller smuggles a diamond necklace in her bag. While steering clear of problems and helping each other get what they want, the duo comes to realise the true meaning of love.

programme.title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
programme.desc: A shunned husband disguises himself as a dancer to win back his wife.

programme.title: Dil To Pagal Hai
programme.desc: In the world of stage shows love starts to blossom between two members of a dance troupe.

programme.title: Mohabbatein
programme.desc: Principal Shankar's institute is famous for its discipline. He recruits a teacher who encourages his students to find love and fight for it.

programme.title: Arjun Reddy
programme.desc: A brilliant medical student starts down a self-destructive path after his girlfriend is forced to marry another man.

programme.title: Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
programme.desc: Mihir Virani decides to marry Tulsi, the daughter of their family priest. However, his mother strongly disapproves and tries to create various obstacles in Tulsi's life in response.

programme.title: Faltu
programme.desc: Branded `useless' by her parents and mocked by the village, cricket-minded Faltu resists adversity in rural Rajasthan. When she crosses paths with young coach Ayaan Mittal, an exciting journey emerges for Faltu.

programme.title: Teri Meri Doriyaann
programme.desc: It's hate at first sight for Saheba and Angad, but destined to be together, their lives get intertwined by a marriage alliance.

programme.title: Rajjo
programme.desc: Rajjo, an athletically-gifted girl from a village, encounters Arjun, a rich but angry man, when he saves her life during a calamity. Together they navigate the fallout and societal boundaries that try to divide them.

programme.title: Yeh Hai Chahatein
programme.desc: Preesha's life revolves around her son Saaransh, while Rudraksh is an insensitive rockstar. When an unfortunate event brings these two strangers at a crossroad, there might be a new beginning for them.

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: The daily events within the household of an Udaipur family. After Akshara and Naitik's marriage, the parents now focus on their children, Naksh and Naira. However, their efforts are reaping no results.

programme.title: Imlie
programme.desc: All Imlie wanted was to create a name for herself in the city. But upon her arrival, she finds herself caught in the middle of Aditya and Malini's love story.

programme.title: Pandya Store
programme.desc: The middle-class Pandya family has a grocery shop named Pandya Store, run by Gautam and his wife Dhara. Gautam also has three younger brothers, whom they treat as their own children.

programme.title: Faltu
programme.desc: Branded `useless' by her parents and mocked by the village, cricket-minded Faltu resists adversity in rural Rajasthan. When she crosses paths with young coach Ayaan Mittal, an exciting journey emerges for Faltu.

programme.title: Teri Meri Doriyaann
programme.desc: It's hate at first sight for Saheba and Angad, but destined to be together, their lives get intertwined by a marriage alliance.

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
programme.desc: Virat sacrifices his love to honour the promise he made to a dying man. Trapped between the customs of the past and what he holds in his heart, he tries to find love beyond the chains of duty.

programme.title: Yeh Hai Chahatein
programme.desc: Preesha's life revolves around her son Saaransh, while Rudraksh is an insensitive rockstar. When an unfortunate event brings these two strangers at a crossroad, there might be a new beginning for them.

programme.title: Rajjo

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa has parted with her goals and ambitions in a bid to raise her family. However, she feels dejected that she fails to get any credit for the sacrifices she has made for her family.

programme.title: Awakening With Brahmakumaris
programme.desc: Exploring issues affecting people in their daily life and providing practical spiritual solutions.

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein
programme.desc: A Tamilian man and a Punjabi woman are connected by their love for the man's daughter. The woman, unable to bear children, shares a very close, motherly relationship with the girl.

programme.title: Festive Feasts
programme.desc: Boost your culinary skills and impress guests in the process with two decadent holiday recipes.

programme.title: Sanjeev Kapoor's Kitchen
programme.desc: In this Unique show Master Chef Sanjeev Kapoor will teach the nation his top recipes. From main course to starters, it will feature his best signature dishes.

programme.title: Turban Tadka
programme.desc: Chef Harpal cooks up amazing traditional and innovative dishes with his special 'tadka' of Indian spices.
